milestones.text: 1,000 students from 25 countries participate
One Laptop Per Child launches as a social enterprise

Ahmad creates platform to bring business minded young people to the forefront of solving social issues through business startups

years.title: Bill Clinton Parnters with the Hult Prize

milestones.text: Hult Prize and Matt Damon anchor Water.org's first innovation fund of US$2M
Hult International Business School becomes official sponsor
Water Challenge is launched asks students to provide clean water to 10 million people
Swedish Billionairre backs the program, Hult Prize is born

Hult Prize announces US$1M Prize for social entrepreneurship
First Mexican team participates in Hult Prize opening the pathway for entry into Latin America
Hult Prize funds m.Paani, today's largest loyalt and rewards program focused on India's BOP
Over 5,000 Applicants Compete
Bill Clinton delivers keynote speech at Hult Prize final and awards US$1M check
Energy Challenge asks students to eliminate the use of the kerosene lamp by 2020.
2012 Sunny Money wins Hult Prize Energy Challenge asking young people to eliminate the use of the kerosene lamp by 2020.  Today, Sunny Money is one of Africa's largest solar light suppliers.
Hult Prize Named one of the top 5 ideas changing the world on cover of TIME
Bill Clinton moves Hult Prize as opening Clinton Global Initiative Annual MeetingHult Prize launches ground-breaking business incubator
